author: cframpton
msg: Log the installer version number and os in the log file.  Fix build file so version number in -app.xml is updated correctly - if build.number is loaded at the top of the file, and <buildnumber> is called to increment the build number, build.number is still the old value because properties are immutable.

author: jlboudart
msg: removes reference to easyant.ivy.instance in antunit plugin since we introduce a new task to invoke it :)

author: jlboudart
msg: Introduces a new task to configure easyant ivy instance

author: mamta
msg: DERBY-5407 When run across the network, dblook produces unusable DDL for VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA columns.
Backporting only the test from 10.6 to 10.5. The bug doesn't exist in 10.5 but there is no test code coverage for SYSCOLUMNS.COLUMNDATATYPE in 10.5 and hence putting the test in 10.5

author: ddumont
msg: SHINDIG-1827 - Allow container implementations to more easily override and extend rpc registered service handlers.
